rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I am Vito Holleshorn, special envoy for
Superbia. A pleasure to make your
acquaintance.

rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0002
rows.name:
To commemorate this auspicious
meeting, allow me to inform you of
something.

rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Did you know that all Driver weapons
are furnished with elements?

rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0004
rows.name:
For example, weapons with the fire
element are effective against monsters
of the water element...

rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Also Blades have a fixed element
that represents their power.

rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0006
rows.name:
For example, take the Crown Jewels
of Superbia: Kagutsuchi is fire
and Wadatsumi is water.

rows.label: tlk70000074_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Matching your weapon and Blade
elements to counter the monster's
element is key to clinching victory.
